      • UriFromMrl

        public static android.net.Uri UriFromMrl(java.lang.String mrl)
        VLC authorize only "-._~" in Mrl format, android Uri authorize "_-!.~'()*". Therefore, decode the characters authorized by Android Uri when creating an Uri from VLC.

      • encodeVLCUri

        public static java.lang.String encodeVLCUri(@NonNull
                                            android.net.Uri uri)

      • encodeVLCString

        public static java.lang.String encodeVLCString(@NonNull
                                               java.lang.String mrl)
        VLC only acccepts "-._~" in Mrl format, android Uri accepts "_-!.~'()*". Therefore, encode the characters authorized by Android Uri when creating a mrl from an Uri.

      • getThumbnail

        public static byte[] getThumbnail(LibVLC libVLC,
                                  android.net.Uri uri,
                                  int i_width,
                                  int i_height)
        Get a media thumbnail.
        戻り値:
        a bytearray with the RGBA thumbnail data inside.

      • getThumbnail
